channel.title: Keyboard Shortcuts on One Problem Solved
channel.description: Recent content in Keyboard Shortcuts on One Problem Solved

item.title: Visual Studio Code Keyboard Shortcuts
item.description: My Commonly-Used Shortcuts Shortcut Description Ctrl + K + S List all shortcuts Alt + ⇧ Move line up. Alt + Shift + ⇧ Copy above. Ctrl + Shift + L Put multi-cursor at all occurences of current selections Ctrl + C/X Copy/Cut line Ctrl + Shift + K Delete line Ctrl + (Shift) + Enter Insert line (above) or below Ctrl + (K) + Shift + [/] Fold/Unfold (sub) region Ctrl + Shift + E | Focus on file explorer
